author: wsjcom
title: Stopping School Shootings and Mass Murder
text:
Regarding your editorial “Responding to Parkland” (Feb. 16): I am a gun owner and not a liberal. All of my gun-owning friends are quite conservative. But every one of them agrees that we need enhanced background checks on the sale of firearms, bans on military-style assault weapons and bump stocks, limitations on the size of ammo magazines and federally funded research on the causes and consequences of gun violence. It’s hard for me to see how these common-sense measures significantly curtail citizens’ Second Amendment rights.
I...
